thread.title: How to Wear Spring's Classic Scarf Prints - WSJ.com

author: Photography Nadine Ijewere
title: How to Wear Spring's Classic Scarf Prints - WSJ.com
text: How to Wear Spring's Classic Scarf Prints Graphic abstractions and elegant florals inspire this spring's relaxed pantsuits and dresses. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Scroll PATTERN PLAY Marisa Witkin shirt, $790, marisawitkin​.com, Christian Wijnants scarf (worn as belt), $271, christianwijnants​.com and Etro pants, $1,990, etro​.com. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Sies Marjan trench, $1,495, siesmarjan.com, Proenza Schouler dress, $2,795, proenzaschouler.com and Wixson bra, $575, wixsonparis.com. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Dries Van Noten top, $1,135, and skirt, $1,140, Bergdorf Goodman, 754 Fifth Avenue, New York, The Row pants, $890, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, and Hermès shoes, $2,200, Hermès stores nationwide. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Joseph blazer, $960, joseph-fashion​.com, Sharon Wauchob top, $580, and pants, $520, shopcurve​.com, and The Row shoes, $990, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Céline top, $1,350, skirt, $2,250, and belt, $2,200, Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York, and The Row shoes, $990, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Pierre Louis Mascia robe, $1,045, and scarf, $240, fwrd.com, The Row tank, $320, net-a-porter.com and Colovos pants, $495, ikram.com. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Hermès shirt, $3,200, and pants, $6,300, Hermès stores nationwide. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Christian Wijnants coat, $307, dress, $504, and scarf, $271, christianwijnants​.com. Model, Bhumika Arora at the Society Management; hair, Junya Nakashima; makeup, Chichi Saito. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff MAJOR MOTIFS Versace jacket, $2,400, shirt, $1,295, skirt, $2,595, and shoes, $995, select Versace stores, and Prounis hoop earrings, $1,680, hoop with pearl, $6,380, and ring, $6,930, prounisjewelry​.com. Photography by Nadine Ijewere; Fashion editor Laura Stoloff Advertisement
